NK003(ga)018:0: 'phags pa dri med rnam gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor mchod
NK003(ga)018:1: rten du gzhug pa'i cho ga bklag pas grub pa'i
NK003(ga)018:2: gsal byed dang mchod rten khang brtsegs 'di nyid kyi
NK003(ga)018:3: dkyil 'khor thig yig bcas mthong bas don rtogs bzhugs
NK003(ga)018:4: so // na mahgu ru sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sat+wa
NK003(ga)018:5: b+h+yah 'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa gnyis kyi
NK003(ga)018:6: gzungs la brten nas gsang sngags kyi dkyil 'khor mchod
NK003(ga)018:7: rten du bzhugs pa'i tshul la /
NK003(ga)018:9: dngos gzhi gnyis res ston te /
NK003(ga)018:10: dang po 'od zer dri med kyi sgo nas bsnyen pa bya ba la /
NK003(ga)018:11: tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi bco lnga sogs dge ba'i dus gang yang rung bar /
NK003(ga)018:12: man+dala gru bzhi ba byung dri bzang gis byugs par
NK003(ga)018:13: ring bsrel can gyi mchod rten la nyer spyod bdun
NK003(ga)018:22: dri bzang bcas chu gtsang dang sbyar ba'i mchod yon zangs tshogs kyi bzed zhal dang bcas pa /
NK003(ga)018:27: dur khrod kyi mgal dum las byas pa'i rdo rje tsan+dana dmar pos byugs pa /
NK003(ga)018:28: ras skud dmar po sum bsgril la mdud pa gsum bor te b+ho d+hi rdog re brgyus pa dang /
NK003(ga)018:30: ku sha'i sor gdub dang stan gyi ku sha phon re /
NK003(ga)018:31: 'om bu'i so shing bcas grangs mnyam /
NK003(ga)018:33: rol mo'i bye brag bcas 'du byas nas /
NK003(ga)018:34: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam rgya mgo la bzhag ste
NK003(ga)018:35: sogs nas phyi rol du 'gro ba srung ba'i bar
NK003(ga)018:36: dang / de nas phyi rol du song ste khrus dang /
NK003(ga)018:38: so shing dor ba'i bar byed /
NK003(ga)018:39: nang du 'ong ste phyag byas nas 'dug ste dam tshig la 'jug pa nas /
NK003(ga)018:40: skyil krung gis 'khod par gyur bar dang /
NK003(ga)018:41: rdo dril bcas d+hu na sogs nas /
NK003(ga)018:42: las thams cad mdzad du gsol bar /
NK003(ga)018:44: srung skud ku sha ras bcas 'gyed /
NK003(ga)018:46: bzlas pa'i skabs kyi bstod de mngon sum lta bur gyur bar /
NK003(ga)018:49: nye snying brgya rtsa sogs ji mang bzlas te phreng ba 'bul ba'i tshul byed pa'i bar dang /
NK003(ga)018:50: gong gi rab 'byams rgya mtsho nas bstod pa'i mtha' bar /
NK003(ga)018:53: de nas dri med rnam gnyis kyi gzungs mdo bklag pa sogs bya'o //
NK003(ga)018:54: de nas mchod rten gyi rmang gzhi bting ba'i sar sa chog bya bar /
NK003(ga)018:55: gong du bshad pa'i man+dala nas rol mo'i bye brag
NK003(ga)018:56: gi bar yo byad rnams 'du byas zhing khyad par
NK003(ga)018:57: gzhi bgegs kyi gtor ma gnyis /
NK003(ga)018:62: stegs gzhan zhig la nyer spyod phreng tshar gcig bcas 'du bya /
NK003(ga)018:63: gso sbyong blang ba phyogs bcu na sogs nas sgrol bar shog bar lan gsum /
NK003(ga)018:64: tshul khrims rnam dag gi gzungs nyer gcig /
NK003(ga)018:65: gzhi der gtor ma gnyis bshams la zhi khro ltar bsngo /
NK003(ga)018:66: khro bo mnol med sngags nas bdag nyid sbyangs par gyur bar bsnyen pa'i skabs ltar /
NK003(ga)018:67: de nas las sngags bzla bzhin lto 'phye rtsis nas
NK003(ga)018:68: rung bar khru do brkos nas chu sa'i pra brtags
NK003(ga)018:69: las sngags bzla / ba byung gis byugs 'thas par
NK003(ga)018:70: bcags pa'i dbus su khung bu brkos nas gter bcug
NK003(ga)018:71: las sngags bzla / / bsang gtor bya /
NK003(ga)018:72: slob dpon sa de'i dbus dang /
NK003(ga)018:73: gzhan rnams kyang der phyogs pas 'dug ste /
NK003(ga)018:74: rang gi stan sogs nas bzlas pa'i mthar phreng ba 'bul ba'i bar sngar bsnyen pa'i skabs ltar dang /
NK003(ga)018:75: mchod pa'i dus nyer spyod slob dpon mdun du phul /
NK003(ga)018:76: de nas bsangs gtor dang seng phur byin brlabs nas
NK003(ga)018:77: bzhengs te phur pa gcig de mgal dum rdo rje'i
NK003(ga)018:78: tho bas phyogs mtshams su gdab tshul bya /
NK003(ga)018:79: slar yang de nyid du bzhugs bzhin rjes chog rab
NK003(ga)018:80: 'byams rgya mtsho nas bcings par dkrol ba'i bar bsnyen
NK003(ga)018:85: dkon brtsegs nang gi gtsug na rin chen sogs bklag /
NK003(ga)018:86: gzhan yang mchod sbyin bya ba sogs tshogs bsags rigs ji 'grub byed /
NK003(ga)018:87: s+aats+tsha gdab pa'i cho ga bzhin sats+tsha brgya rtsa brgyad dam /
NK003(ga)018:88: stong rtsa sogs tshul ldan gdab ste gzungs khung brus /
NK003(ga)018:89: skam thag chod pa dang gzungs 'bul /
NK003(ga)018:90: slob dpon gyis bum pa bya rgyud rdzas ldan dri med rnam gnyis kyi sngags kyis brlab /
NK003(ga)018:91: de nas cho ga dngos la bsham dang /
NK003(ga)018:94: sa phyogs yangs shing bskor ba byed thub par stegs gru bzhi dkyil thang steng me tog bkram /
NK003(ga)018:95: mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad bkod /
NK003(ga)018:96: s+aats+tsha gzhan rnams kyang nye bar bkod /
NK003(ga)018:97: de'i phyogs bzhir nyer spyod cha re bsham /
NK003(ga)018:99: sgo bzhir rdzas bdun gyi dung zhal bzhi bzed zhal bcas /
NK003(ga)018:101: mthar ba dan dmar po brgya rtsa brgyad /
NK003(ga)018:102: de'i mdun sha chang min pa'i kha zas sna tshogs /
NK003(ga)018:104: rgyan phreng na bza' lnga tshan lnga /
NK003(ga)018:106: bkra shis rdzas brgyad rnams kyi tsakli /
NK003(ga)018:107: snod gcig tu gtor zlum mtheb ril bzhis bskor ba gcig dang /
NK003(ga)018:108: cha gsum gtor ma spyi ltar kha zas kyis brgyan pa /
NK003(ga)018:109: slob dpon mdun g.yon nas brtsams rma bya'i sgro lnga'i chun po /
NK003(ga)018:112: me long khrus ras dang bcas pa /
NK003(ga)018:113: khrus bum me tog bye thun ting shag bcas /
NK003(ga)018:115: chos thams cad dmigs su med pa sogs nas gzhung
NK003(ga)018:116: ltar cho ga ma 'khrul bar bklag nas bden pa'i
NK003(ga)018:117: stobs brjod pa'i mthar gzungs rnam gnyis bklag cing sbyin
NK003(ga)018:118: bdag sogs la gzungs chab stsal /
NK003(ga)018:119: rma bya'i sgro chun gyis bya ba /
NK003(ga)018:120: bye thun dang gzungs chab dur khrod sogs phyogs kun la gtor bzhin sngags bzla /
NK003(ga)018:122: bkra shis me tog 'thor ba bcas bya'o //
NK003(ga)018:123: de nas gtsug tor dri med kyi cho ga la /
NK003(ga)018:124: mdun du chu gnyis nyer spyod dang bcas pa bshams /
NK003(ga)018:125: rdor dril sogs dang bsangs chu 'du bya /
NK003(ga)018:126: mchod pa rnams bsang spyangs nas tshogs bsags mthar gso
NK003(ga)018:127: sbyong cho ga ltar blangs nas bzlas pa'i mthar re
NK003(ga)018:128: zhig gyes la / bang rim bzhi pa'i steng thog
NK003(ga)018:129: 'jam par byas nas ba byung dang dris byug par
NK003(ga)018:130: dkyil thang bkram mthar sgor mchod dang /
NK003(ga)018:131: shar du bla gtor dkar po gcig /
NK003(ga)018:134: bkra shis rdzas brgyad rnams kyi tsakli /
NK003(ga)018:135: byang shar du du ru ka /
NK003(ga)018:139: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan du mda' dar me long can brgyad /
NK003(ga)018:142: rma bya'i sgro chun brgyad bcas bsnyal stabs tshon skud sna lngas bskor ba legs shing brtan par bya /
NK003(ga)018:147: bdag bskyed sngon du song bas 'thus /
NK003(ga)018:148: mdun gyi dkyil 'khor bsang sbyang nas /
NK003(ga)018:149: gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bar dang /
NK003(ga)018:150: phyi rol du cha gsum btang /
NK003(ga)018:151: rdo dril bcas yig brgya bzla bzhin mchod rten la lan gsum bskor te /
NK003(ga)018:153: rmi ngan 'jigs dang sogs phyogs gzhan la'ang de ltar bya /
NK003(ga)018:154: mthar shar sgo nas rdo dril bcas thal sbyar bya //
NK003(ga)018:155: bde gshegs sogs nas 'byor gyur cig /
NK003(ga)018:157: rang gral du zhugs te gtang rag gi mchod bstod nas bsngo smon shis brjod kyi bar bya /
NK003(ga)018:158: dkyil 'khor rgyan mchod bcas pa ras gtsang ma'i zhal
NK003(ga)018:159: khebs bkab ste thog bkal la bum rten pad+ma brtsig
NK003(ga)018:160: go // de nas 'od zer dri med kyi sgo nas srog shing 'dzugs pa'i cho ga la /
NK003(ga)018:161: sta gon dang dngos gzhi gnyis dang /
NK003(ga)018:163: bsnyen pa'i skabs kyi man+dala nas b+ho d+ha'i bgrang phreng rol mo'i bye brag bar 'du bya /
NK003(ga)018:164: bum rten pad+ma'i nang ngos 'jam par bya /
NK003(ga)018:165: der ba byung dang 'bras bcas 'du bya /
NK003(ga)018:166: sa chog gi dbu'i phyogs bcu na sogs kyis gso sbyong blangs nas sngags bar /
NK003(ga)018:167: bsnyen pa'i dbu'i khro bo'i mnol med sngags rgya nas
NK003(ga)018:168: ras kyi ze'u sogs ngag 'don dang bya byed sor
NK003(ga)018:169: bzhag ji bzhin / srog shing cho ga'i bdag gis
NK003(ga)018:170: brgal dka' sogs nas bzlas pa'i mthar dngos grub stsal
NK003(ga)018:175: bzod gsol nas dkrol bar gyur bar /
NK003(ga)018:176: slob dpon bum rten khar phebs te ba byung gis
NK003(ga)018:177: byugs shing thig gru bzhir bcad nas shar gyi char
NK003(ga)018:178: dri'i theg le gru bzhi gnyis 2 dang /
NK003(ga)018:182: nub 7 byang bcas su zlum po re byas la 'bras tshom bkod /
NK003(ga)018:188: gos zung sna lnga bcas bkod /
NK003(ga)018:190: rang nyid mchod rten gyi nye logs su ku sha'i
NK003(ga)018:191: gdan la shar du phyogs pas 'dug la nas bstod
NK003(ga)018:192: pa'i mtha'i bar / 'degs rgya bcas te /
NK003(ga)018:194: rnam smin gyis lus la thim par gyur bar dang /
NK003(ga)018:195: shes rab snying po bklag ste gyes /
NK003(ga)018:196: tshom bu dang mchod gtor bsdu /
NK003(ga)018:197: dngos gzhi la dkyil thang bkram pa'i dbus su srog shing 'dzugs /
NK003(ga)018:198: phyogs bzhi nas 'then te ka sgrom lta bus ya yo mi yong bar bya /
NK003(ga)018:199: srog shing rtsa bar gong gi s+aats+tsha rnams dkram /
NK003(ga)018:200: mtshams thams cad du dri bzang po'i tshos kyis gtams /
NK003(ga)018:201: phyi'i grwa bzhir dung zhal dri lngas bkang bar chu'i rgyun cung zad bran pa bzhi /
NK003(ga)018:202: shar gyi snam bu'i khar spos snod gsum /
NK003(ga)018:203: lhor dri'i dung zhal ting me tog gis gang ba gcig /
NK003(ga)018:204: nub tu yol go mar khu /
NK003(ga)018:207: 'bras dang nas dkar bcas blugs pa'i thug pa /
NK003(ga)018:208: dung zhal dkar gsum gyis bkang ba /
NK003(ga)018:209: yol gor sman dang shing tog sna tshogs kyi 'bras bu dgu bcu rtsa dgu /
NK003(ga)018:210: byang du sha chang ma 'dres pa'i zhal zas sna tshogs dang mar gyi gtor zlum /
NK003(ga)018:211: dung zhal la bya rgyud bum rdzas ldan pa /
NK003(ga)018:212: ting me tog la spos btsugs pa /
NK003(ga)018:213: nub byang du dung zhal gyi rgyab tu shing zla
NK003(ga)018:214: gam gzugs dmar po la tshogs bdag bris pa'i spyi
NK003(ga)018:215: bor mar me / mthar nub nas brtsams te /
NK003(ga)018:216: mchod yon lan tsh+war rdzas bdun sbyar ba /
NK003(ga)018:217: dri chab dri lnga snum gyis spags pa /
NK003(ga)018:220: dkar mngar sbyar ba'i zhal zas /
NK003(ga)018:221: khur ba sna tshogs pa dang shing tog sna tshogs pa rgya sran gyi 'bru mar khus spags pa /
NK003(ga)018:225: lan tsh+wa bcas 'o mas spags pa /
NK003(ga)018:226: mar me rnams 'khor bar bskor mthar dri dang snum bsres pas byug /
NK003(ga)018:227: phyogs mtshams brgyad du rma bya'i mdongs kyis tog byas pa'i rgyal mtshan shar dkar /
NK003(ga)018:234: byang shar ljang ser rnams thung ngu re dang /
NK003(ga)018:235: rdzas brgyad tsakli bcas thams cad khod snyoms par byas pa'i phyi nas ras yol gyis bskor /
NK003(ga)018:236: mchod rten gyi rmang gi steng phyi'i phyogs bzhir spos mar me zhal zas cha re /
NK003(ga)018:237: gtor zlum 'khor brgyad re can dang /
NK003(ga)018:238: mdun du stegs bu rdzas bdun sbyar ba'i mchod yon bzed zhal dang bcas pa /
NK003(ga)018:240: slob dpon mdun yo byad sngar bsnyen skabs bzhin 'du byas nas /
NK003(ga)018:241: dri med rnam gnyis kyi gzungs bum chus sbyong khrus rgyas pa dang rab gnas bsdus tsam byed /
NK003(ga)018:242: sang zhogs chog ltar gso sbyong blangs /
NK003(ga)018:243: bsnyen skabs ltar khro bo mnol med sngags rgya nas /
NK003(ga)018:244: ras kyi ze'u kha bcings pa'i bar bya /
NK003(ga)018:245: de nas srog shing cho ga'i rnam 'byor dngos gzhi bdag gis brgal dka' nas /
NK003(ga)018:246: bla bre la sogs pas brgyan par gyur bar byas la lha so so'i sngags lha sta gon bzhin /
NK003(ga)018:248: ya te de ni s+w+aa h+aa'i bar tshar re brjod /
NK003(ga)018:250: bzlas pa'i mtha' bar dkyus bzhin bya /
NK003(ga)018:251: gtso 'khor bcu'i sngags la rang rang gi phyag rgya bca' /
NK003(ga)018:254: tshogs bsags mthar 'od zer dri med kyi gzungs mdo ci 'grub bklag /
NK003(ga)018:255: de nas shar sogs phyogs bzhi nas phyag byas nas
NK003(ga)018:256: stan la 'dug ste mchod pa gtor bsngo bzlas pa
NK003(ga)018:257: gsol gdab kyi mthar thug gi bar tshar re bya
NK003(ga)018:258: / mjug tu shar nas ye d+harma sngon 'gros phun sum tshogs pa'i bkra shis brjod /
NK003(ga)018:259: mdun gyi nyer spyod dang phyogs bzhi'i mchod pa kha gsos te /
NK003(ga)018:262: thams cad stong nyid sogs sngags bcas /
NK003(ga)018:263: badz+ra ar+g+ham sogs sngags rgya bcas mchod nas /
NK003(ga)018:264: bla ma sogs nas bdag nyid la bsrung bar gyur bar /
NK003(ga)018:265: bzang spyod smon lam sogs dang bkra shis bcas /
NK003(ga)018:267: de nas dkyil 'khor de la zhal khebs mtshams dar ser po btang ngo //
NK003(ga)018:268: gong du dkyil 'khor gyi thig dang rdul tshon byin rlabs sogs gnang yang legs shing /
NK003(ga)018:269: ras bris la ri mo mkhan dam tshig la gnas
NK003(ga)018:270: shing yo byad sogs byin rlabs dang ldan pas bri
NK003(ga)018:271: / de dag ni dkyil 'khor dang cho ga rgyas pa'i lugs so //
NK003(ga)018:272: mchod rten chung ngu sogs la nye logs su 'od
NK003(ga)018:273: zer dri med kyi dkyil 'khor bshams te srog shing
NK003(ga)018:274: 'dzugs pa'i dngos gzhi'i cho ga gso sbyong blang pa
NK003(ga)018:276: s+aats+tsha'i cho ga tshang bar byas nas dkyil thang dang s+aats+tsha kha shas sogs mchod rten du bcug /
NK003(ga)018:277: mchod rdzas gzhan dang s+aats+tsha lhag ma rnams mchod rten
NK003(ga)018:278: rnying pa sogs la phul ba ni dkyil 'khor 'bring
NK003(ga)018:280: khang brtsegs mchod rten sogs la 'di nyid kyi s+aats+tsha
NK003(ga)018:281: gdab pa'i cho ga ltar ji tsam nus pa gdab
NK003(ga)018:283: gang du bya ba'i sar sa chog spyi ltar mdor bsdus dang gter bum tsam bzhugs /
NK003(ga)018:284: rmang gi steng thog khang bzang nang rkyang nul byas
NK003(ga)018:285: la re mig brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mtha' zlum skor
NK003(ga)018:286: la dris byug nas me tog sil ma bkram pa'i
NK003(ga)018:291: ba dan dmar po brgya rtsa brgyad bcas dgram ste
NK003(ga)018:292: khod snyoms par byas la zhal khebs dmar pos g.yogs
NK003(ga)018:293: / de nas lhag rnams mchod rten gyis bkang la steng du rgyal mtshan sogs 'dzugs /
NK003(ga)018:294: phyi'i phyogs bzhir mchod pa rgyas par bsham /
NK003(ga)018:295: mdun du khrus bum me long ras /
NK003(ga)018:304: slob dpon mdun rma bya'i sgro chun lnga /
NK003(ga)018:309: dngos gzhi'i cho ga bklag pas 'grub pa nang bzhin bya ba ni bsdus pa'i phyogs dang /
NK003(ga)018:310: thams cad la spyir shes par bya ba dbang dang
NK003(ga)018:311: rjes gnang nod cing phyag rgya rnams bcing bar mkhas
NK003(ga)018:312: pa / bsnyen pa sngon song gi gang zag gis
NK003(ga)018:313: smyung bar gnas pa'am dkar gsum sogs la brten nas
NK003(ga)018:314: cho ga rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gang byed kyang bklag
NK003(ga)018:315: chog gzhung gi sa bcad kyi don la legs par
NK003(ga)018:316: bsam ste lag len ma 'khrul ba dang khyad par
NK003(ga)018:317: gzungs mdo gnyis s+aats+tsha bcas ci 'grub dang /
NK003(ga)018:318: 'od zer dri med kyi gzungs ring thung gnyis /
NK003(ga)018:319: gtsug tor dri med kyi gzungs bcas nyis khri chig stong tsam re bsags shing /
NK003(ga)018:320: lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas brtsam na
NK003(ga)018:321: dpal gyi mgur nas phan yon ji snyed gsungs pa
NK003(ga)018:323: mchod rten thig tshad mdor bsdus la //
NK003(ga)018:324: byang chub chen po'i mchod rten ni //
NK003(ga)018:325: yar mar cha chen bcu bdun srid //
NK003(ga)018:326: cha chen bcu yin re re zhing //
NK003(ga)018:327: cha phran bzhi bzhir bgo bar bya //
NK003(ga)018:328: sa 'dzin dpangs la cha phran bzhi //
NK003(ga)018:329: srid du tshangs nas g.yas g.yon du //
NK003(ga)018:330: cha phran bco brgyad dam phyed bcu dgu //
NK003(ga)018:331: them skas rim gsum dpangs cha re //
NK003(ga)018:332: srid du bcu bdun drug lnga'o //
NK003(ga)018:333: khri dpangs drug la srid bcu bzhi //
NK003(ga)018:334: pad chung gnyis la dpangs cha re //
NK003(ga)018:335: srid du bco lnga bcu drug re //
NK003(ga)018:336: pad chen dpangs gsum srid bcu dgu /
NK003(ga)018:337: rmang rten dpangs gcig srid bcu drug /
NK003(ga)018:338: tshad med bzhi la dpangs gnyis te //
NK003(ga)018:339: srid du bcu bzhi bcu gsum dang //
NK003(ga)018:340: bcu gnyis bcu gcig rim bzhin bya //
NK003(ga)018:341: mgur mchu dpangs gcig srid bcu pad //
NK003(ga)018:342: bum dpangs bcu bzhi rtsa rtse'i srid //
NK003(ga)018:343: dgu yin bcu gcig nas ni phyir //
NK003(ga)018:344: cha gsum gyen la thig rtsa sbrel //
NK003(ga)018:345: bre rmang dpangs phyed srid bzhi'o //
NK003(ga)018:346: bre mgur dpangs gcig srid du gsum //
NK003(ga)018:347: pad chung dpangs phyed srid phyed bzhi //
NK003(ga)018:348: bre dngos dpangs gnyis srid du bzhi //
NK003(ga)018:350: srid du rtse gsum rtse bzhi'o //
NK003(ga)018:351: chos 'khor bcu gsum dpangs bcu gsum //
NK003(ga)018:352: srid du rtse gcig rtsa ba bzhi //
NK003(ga)018:353: cha re'i gsum gnyis pho 'khor dang //
NK003(ga)018:354: cha re mo 'khor rtag kyang mtshungs //
NK003(ga)018:355: thugs rje mdo gzungs pad+ma'i dbyibs //
NK003(ga)018:356: rtsa dpangs cha gcig rtse phyed gnyis //
NK003(ga)018:357: gzhu bsnol dpangs gcig srid phyed gsum //
NK003(ga)018:358: gdugs dpangs cha gcig srid du gsum //
NK003(ga)018:359: de las zar tshags dpangs gsum dang //
NK003(ga)018:360: mtha' rgya cha bzhi g.yel kha bya //
NK003(ga)018:361: zla ba cha gcig nyi ma gnyis //
NK003(ga)018:362: de steng tog la cha phran gcig /
NK003(ga)018:363: des ni byang chub mchod rten grub //
NK003(ga)018:364: de la gzhi byas gzhan bdun po //
NK003(ga)018:365: bang rim bzhi po'i logs bzhi yi //
NK003(ga)018:366: sum cha re re 'bur dod bya /
NK003(ga)018:367: de la sgo grangs brgya dang brgyad //
NK003(ga)018:368: nga drug bcu drug che chung sogs //
NK003(ga)018:369: gang 'os bkra shis sgo mang can1 //
NK003(ga)018:371: sum skas bsgrigs nas ba gam steng //
NK003(ga)018:372: btsugs pa lha 2babs mchod rten no //
NK003(ga)018:373: skas med gzhan de ji lta ba //
NK003(ga)018:374: cho 'phrul chen po'i mchod rten yin3 //
NK003(ga)018:375: bang rim bzhi po kha g.yel nas //
NK003(ga)018:376: kun tu zlum por bskor ba la //
NK003(ga)018:379: bang rim zur bzhi logs brgyad du //
NK003(ga)018:380: bcad nas g.yel kha spangs pa ni //
NK003(ga)018:381: dge 'dun dbyen zlum mchod rten lags5 //
NK003(ga)018:382: bang rim bzhi po cha gsum du //
NK003(ga)018:383: bsdus te pad chung bcas pa yang //
NK003(ga)018:384: zlum po bskor ba rnam par rgyal6 //
NK003(ga)018:385: pad chung steng du ma pad dpangs //
NK003(ga)018:386: cha chung phyed bzhi g.yel kha dang //
NK003(ga)018:387: de nas bre rmangs man chad la //
NK003(ga)018:388: cha phran du yod dril gzugs bya //
NK003(ga)018:389: rked rgyan cung zhig 'bur ba ni //
NK003(ga)018:390: myang 'das mchod rten nyid du bzhed7 //
NK003(ga)018:391: de dag rnams kyi sa 'dzin gyi //
NK003(ga)018:392: zur bzhir rdo ring dkyus cha chen //
NK003(ga)018:393: bzhi dang logs bzhir them skas bzhi //
NK003(ga)018:394: ba dan dril g.yer chun 'phyang sogs //
NK003(ga)018:395: 'os pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par bya'o //
NK003(ga)018:396: tshon mdog tog ser nyi ma dmar //
NK003(ga)018:397: zla ba gdugs khebs gnyis dkar po //
NK003(ga)018:398: gdugs sngon thugs rje'i sul dmar po //
NK003(ga)018:399: thugs rje ser la pho 'khor ser //
NK003(ga)018:400: mo 'khor srog shing gnyis dmar po //
NK003(ga)018:401: gdugs 'degs sngon po dge bcu ser //
NK003(ga)018:402: sa 'dzin ljang gu them skas gsum //
NK003(ga)018:403: mas nas dmar sngo ser seng khri //
NK003(ga)018:404: dkar po gdung sne sngon po la //
NK003(ga)018:405: pad chung dmar po pad chen ljang //
NK003(ga)018:406: gzhan rnams dung gi mdog ltar mdzes //
NK003(ga)018:407: mkhas pa'i gzhung las legs par shes //
NK003(ga)018:408: khang brtsegs mchod rten byed lugs ni //
NK003(ga)018:409: yas mar cha chen brgyad srid du //
NK003(ga)018:410: cha chen bcu yin re re bzhin //
NK003(ga)018:411: cha phran bzhi bzhir bgo bar bya //
NK003(ga)018:412: rmang rten dpangs su cha phran bzhi //
NK003(ga)018:413: srid du tshangs nas g.yas g.yon du //
NK003(ga)018:414: cha phran bcu dgu pad gdan dpangs /
NK003(ga)018:415: cha gcig srid du bcu bdun no //
NK003(ga)018:416: khang bzang dpangs la cha chen lnga //
NK003(ga)018:417: srid du bcu drug pad chung dpangs //
NK003(ga)018:418: cha gcig srid du bcu bdun no //
NK003(ga)018:419: pad chen dpangs gnyis srid bco brgyad //
NK003(ga)018:420: bang rim gnyis la cha phran re //
NK003(ga)018:422: srid du bcu bdun bcu drug go //
NK003(ga)018:423: pre dngos cha phran dpangs su gsum gyi thog /
NK003(ga)018:424: shing chol bkod pas rab spras la //
NK003(ga)018:425: mdzes pa'i tog gis brgyan bya'o //
NK003(ga)018:426: 'phags pa dri med rnam gnyis kyi //
NK003(ga)018:427: dkyil 'khor las thig gdab tshul bshad //
NK003(ga)018:428: tshangs zur bzhi gdab lte ba nas //
NK003(ga)018:429: ngos rer ji ltar 'tshams pa yis //
NK003(ga)018:430: cha chen bcu gnyis bgo bar bya //
NK003(ga)018:431: drug pa tshun chad lha yi gnas //
NK003(ga)018:432: bdun brgyad gnyis po rtsig pa nas //
NK003(ga)018:433: mda' yab bar du spyi ltar bgo //
NK003(ga)018:434: mda' yab phyi ru cha chen bzhi'i //
NK003(ga)018:435: nang ma gsum la bzhi re bgo //
NK003(ga)018:436: phyi ma dbus dor mtha' gnyis gdab //
NK003(ga)018:437: de rnams bcad lugs 'di ltar te //
NK003(ga)018:438: gser snam 1 ka rgyan mtha' dang mnyam //
NK003(ga)018:440: de las cha phran gcig gis ring //
NK003(ga)018:441: mun 5pa'i phred la cha phran ni //
NK003(ga)018:442: de las gnyis kyis thung gyur kyang //
NK003(ga)018:443: zhing la cha phran phyed gnyis so //
NK003(ga)018:445: cha phran gcig ring zhing cha phran //
NK003(ga)018:446: gcig yin mun snam 7cha phran ni //
NK003(ga)018:447: de las gnyis thung zheng la ni //
NK003(ga)018:448: cha phran phyed gnyis yin par bshad //
NK003(ga)018:450: de las cha phran gcig gis ring //
NK003(ga)018:453: glang rgyab mig gsum bskor tshul ni //
NK003(ga)018:454: snam bu lnga pa'i phyi thig dang //
NK003(ga)018:455: tshangs thig 'dzom pa nas bzung ste //
NK003(ga)018:456: cha phran gsum gyis dbus ma bskor //
NK003(ga)018:457: snam bu gsum pa'i phyi thig dang //
NK003(ga)018:458: tshangs thing 'dzom pa'i g.yas g.yon du //
NK003(ga)018:459: cha phran gnyis te phyin sa nas //
NK003(ga)018:460: cha phran gsum gyis g.yas g.yon bskor //
NK003(ga)018:461: de rnams phyi ru cha re bskor //
NK003(ga)018:462: sna tshogs rdo rje'i ra bskor tshul //
NK003(ga)018:463: snam bu lnga pa'i phyi thig dang //
NK003(ga)018:464: tshangs phyir gsum phyin 'dzom sa nas //
NK003(ga)018:465: bzung ste ka mthar yod pa yi //
NK003(ga)018:466: cha phran gcig pa'i rtse nas bskor //
NK003(ga)018:467: de nas phyed gsum phyi ru gcig /
NK003(ga)018:468: phyin te snga ma'i tshad des bskor //
NK003(ga)018:469: mtha' thig zur nas so so yis //
NK003(ga)018:470: pad rdor sogs kyi bskor thig gdab //
NK003(ga)018:471: de ni gsang ba spyi rgyud las //
NK003(ga)018:472: sa gzhi'i steng du byug spos kyis //
NK003(ga)018:473: dkyil 'khor sor grangs bcu gnyis bya //
NK003(ga)018:474: gsungs pa'i lugs bzhin bris pa yin //
NK003(ga)018:475: lha gnas sogs kyi byed lugs rnams //
NK003(ga)018:476: bklag chog mthong brgyud ltar bya'o //
NK003(ga)018:477: dbang gi dkyil 'khor bri ba dang //
NK003(ga)018:478: cho ga sogs kyi phyag len rnams //
NK003(ga)018:479: gzhan du bshad las rtogs par gyur //
NK003(ga)018:480: zhes pa'ang rang gi zin thor pradz+ny+aa sh+aa sas so //
NK003(ga)018:481: smin gling rdor 'dzin shes rab bstan dar /
NK003(ga)018:485: // dpangs zheng cha chen thams cad la //
NK003(ga)018:486: cha phran bzhi bzhir don thob kyang //
NK003(ga)018:487: stabs bde'i lag len 'di bzhin bya //
NK003(ga)018:488: zheng gi cha chen dang po ni //
NK003(ga)018:489: cha phran bzhir bsil de bzhin du //
NK003(ga)018:490: gnyis bzhag gsum bzhi bzhi ru bsil //
NK003(ga)018:491: lnga pa dbus dor mtha' gnyis gdab //
NK003(ga)018:492: dpangs ni mas nas yar bgrang ba'i //
NK003(ga)018:493: de bzhin dgos gnad cha bsil bya //
NK003(ga)018:494: sgo khyim dpangs zheng cha chen gnyis //
NK003(ga)018:495: rtsa ba tshangs nas g.yas g.yon rgya //
NK003(ga)018:496: cha phran gnyis mtshan legs drangs te //
NK003(ga)018:498: phyi yi pa tra'i zheng dag kyang //
NK003(ga)018:499: ji ltar rigs pas gang mdzes bya //
